1.0.1.name: wordpress/wordpress-admin-bar-space-saving-extension
1.0.1.description:
No longer in development. Not compatible with current version of Wordpress Admin Bar. Sorry.

What it was?

An extension for Wordpress Admin Bar plugin. Removes the header in administration and adds the missing "View site" link into the bar.

This is a plugin for a plugin for Wordpress. Extends Viper007Bond's Wordpress Admin Bar. It hides the header in administration and compensates the missing View site link by adding it directly into the bar. Saves about 90 px of the vertical space.

What were the requirements?

  • Plugin Wordpress Admin Bar must be activated.
  • PHP 5 or higher on your server is necessary to run this plugin.
